item.description:
Join me for a Morning Hike at Ashland State Park!

We will hike around the resevior which is really pretty, and not to difficult at all. Total trip is about 3.75 miles. Dogs welcome! We will wait 10 minutes so please call if your going to be late. 508-415-0590.

Bring a snack (well stop at the beach for a bit, take a swim if you'd like), bug spray, sun block, and water.

Lets meet at the entrance on Chestnut St. right before the tennis courts on left.
From 126 Bellingham/Medway area:
Turn LEFT onto SUMMER ST/MA-126.
Turn SLIGHT RIGHT onto WASHINGTON ST/MA-126/MA-16.
Turn LEFT onto HIGHLAND ST.
HIGHLAND ST becomes CHESTNUT ST.

IF RAINING - check site before you head out.
item.name: Morning Hike
